summary: As he struggles with Alzheimer's disease, country-music legend Glen Campbell embarks on his farewell tour in the U.S., Australia, and Europe.
cast: Glen Campbell|Kim Campbell|Ronald Petersen|Dave Kaplan|Julian Raymond|Ashley Campbell|Bobbie Gale|Jay Leno|Cal Campbell|Shannon Campbell|Jimmy Webb|Vince Gill|Brad Paisley|The Edge|Clancy Fraser|Jill Fraser|Aaron Fraser|T.J. title: Glen Campbell: I'll Be Me
